# SMARTING.GR

SMARTING.GR is a professional electrical and security systems company based in Thessaloniki, Greece. We serve residential and commercial clients in Thessaloniki and Central Macedonia.

## Core Services

- Electrical Installations: Residential and industrial electrical work, panel upgrades, lighting, EV chargers, earthing and surge protection
- Security Systems: CCTV, NVR/DVR, alarms, video intercoms, access control, ANPR, perimeter protection
- Smart Home & Automation: Smart lighting, thermostats, smart locks, voice control, full smart home design and installation
- Networks & Infrastructure: Structured cabling, WiFi mesh systems, access points, NAS solutions, network setup
- Fire Safety: Fire panels, smoke/gas/CO detectors, flood detectors, wireless fire detection systems
- Energy Solutions: Photovoltaic systems (on-grid, off-grid, hybrid), inverters, batteries, energy monitoring
- Specialized Solutions: Elder care systems, hotel/Airbnb solutions, industrial monitoring, environmental sensors
- Support & Maintenance: Technical support, maintenance contracts, remote monitoring, system upgrades

## Authoritative Pages

The following pages contain the most accurate and up-to-date information about SMARTING.GR:

## Service Area

Primary service area: Thessaloniki and Central Macedonia, Greece

## Language

Primary language: Greek  
Secondary language: English
